mapper.select: select is_mentor, study_img, study_name, study_num, host_id, start_date, finish_date, max from study_room
mapper.insert: INSERT study_room(study_type_num, study_name, study_rule, study_img, start_date, finish_date, max, ip, is_mentor, host_id) VALUES(#{study_type_num}, #{study_name}, #{study_rule}, #{study_img}, #{start_date}, #{finish_date}, #{max}, #{ip}, #{is_mentor}, #{host_id})
